content.html: Let. It. Go. Your reaction is that of someone who can't cope with disagreement. Neither you, nor the programme, is as important as you seem to think. Without Lycett's intervention the programme would have been instantly forgotten about. Now it has a little place in TV history.
content.value:
Let. It. Go.

Your reaction is that of someone who can't cope with disagreement.

Neither you, nor the programme, is as important as you seem to think.

Without Lycett's intervention the programme would have been instantly forgotten about. Now it has a little place in TV history.
